name: Cheryl Grudzinski
text: No problems with the order. Delivery was fast pleasant Delivery person. And pizza and bread sticks were hot and very tasty. Very good pizza.

text: Beautiful interior love the remodel. Good food and alright service.

name: Kevin Morales
text: I have the Pizza Hut app and one day I ordered pizza that I paid for, then ordered wings for free from the rewards program and the fryer had been broken. I later got a phone call saying that they weren‚Äôt able to make my wings and the points would go back to my account. The points never came back not buying from there again

text: The pizza was cheaply made. No ingredients hardly at all.  We order many Pizza Hut pizzas but this may change after this last pizza order.

But by the time I received the pizza and wings were not fresh anymore.  Got a coupon for family free bread sticks. But worst experience at a pizza hut

name: Mercedes Marie
text: I am a very popular customer, I order it maybe once every week or two. I always pay with cash but since I had none on me, I decided to use my card not knowing they were going to take 6$ extra from me! I know that it is only 6$, but that is ‚Ä¶More

text: Food is good and delivered promptly and  hot to the table.  Location was recently updated and it's a huge positive image change for The Hut. 4 stars is a pretty good by my standards.

name: Bridget Wright
text: Ordered mild wings and got honey wings, pizza wasn't correct either. Called this location for clearity to be told i was wrong. Finally i was given to the manager Jamie to be told that there wasnt anything they could do about it. Buyer beware of service and quality we will not be back

text: Ordered online and they completley messed my order up and then when I called to complain the lady who answered so rude  Never Again I'll go some where else and this is the South Locust one

name: Andrew Russell
text: Flavor of food was ok. Service was poor, seemed as if they didn't care about their job, or their customers. I am glad to know that this location on South Locust will be leveled and a new strip mall carry-out location will be put in its ‚Ä¶More

name: jet nielsen
text: manager gives bad vibes i think there is  a reason they are hiring

name: Justine Guzinski
text: Their food is terrible, their prices are worse. $38.99 for a pizza! And it was terrible. Pizza Hut used to be our go to place for date nights in the 80s and weekly lunches in the 90s. They are NOT the same Pizza Hut. Yuck.

name: Ray Mora
text: it's really lousy no service you got to get up and go or do you want food they don't do nothing for you around here I would never come again this is on South locust Street Grand island Nebraska don't ever come here

text: Nice people put that gave us the the wrong Pizza and the wrong parmesan wings I ordered a pepperoni pizza with bell peppers and mushrooms and two orders of parmesan wings they gave us one boneless and I order bone in and they gave us cheese pizza with bell peppers and mushrooms and the wings was not good at all

name: Braum Guy
text: Ordered two pizzas and bread sticks with sauce... 45 min wait... no sauce... called asked for sauce.. said they would bring it, asked for fresh breadsticks with it. 1hr 30 mins later... where‚Äôs my sauce and fresh breadsticks?

name: Sonya Poland
text: Horrible! Picked up carry out and didn't give me what I ordered. Called to get correct order and was on hold for over 5 minutes. Thet put in a new order and state ot will be ready in 12 to 14 minutes.....25 minutes later I finally receive the order I placed over an hour earlier and the food was not the quality of other Pizza Huts!

name: Leon Silva Mendoza
text: I currently work in the food service industry and I get late food when it is busy. But when I went there with my family, we ordered at 5:58 and we finally got all of our food by 6:40! Worst part they gave us the same damn excuse of "Sorry we WERE busy"! The were only two groups there when we were there and we were one of them!
